intro: Step into Teeny Tiny Town, a cozy and colorful city-building puzzle where every move counts.
description:
By merging three matching tiles, you’ll gradually transform a humble settlement into a thriving metropolis—growing your world from adorable beginnings to awe-inspiring skylines. 
With no timers or pressure, you’re free to build, relax, and shape your town at your own pace.

Game features:
- Merge and Evolve Gameplay: Connect three identical tiles to unlock new buildings and expand your city step by step.
- Customizable Themes: Personalize your town with unique looks, including festive options like Halloween and Christmas.
- Night Mode: Switch to a glowing nighttime view and watch your city sparkle under the stars.
- Stress-Free Play: No countdowns, no rush—just calm, creative building at your own rhythm.
- Atmospheric Vibes: Enjoy lo-fi music and low-poly art that create a relaxing, minimalist atmosphere.
- Casual Yet Strategic: Easy to pick up, but with enough depth to keep you planning your next clever merge.
- Family-Friendly Fun: Accessible for all ages, blending puzzle-solving with city-building charm.

Why You’ll Love It
Teeny Tiny Town combines the simplicity of a match-three puzzle with the satisfaction of city-building strategy. 
Whether you’re chasing the perfect layout, experimenting with different themes, or just unwinding with its cozy soundtrack, this game offers a relaxing yet rewarding experience.
